snippet: James R. Schaefer was most recently global head of the power and renewable energy group at UBS. He will be a senior managing director at Blackstone Advisory Partners.
abstract: James R. Schaefer was most recently global head of the power and renewable energy group at UBS. He will be a senior managing director at Blackstone Advisory Partners.

headline.main: Blackstone Hires UBS Banker to Lead Energy Advisory Group
